## ReadableLiquity.getLiquidityMiningStake() method

Get the amount of Uniswap ETH/HCHF LP tokens currently staked by an address in liquidity mining.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getLiquidityMiningStake(address?: string): Promise<Decimal>;
```
